message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price, considering its worth to you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Hi Bob, I understand your desire to save, but $11,000 is quite a bit below my initial asking price. Could we meet in the middle at $12,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
